text: Pauline Picard (Born on 1919 or 1920presumed body was discovered on or 25 or 26 May 1922) was a missing Breton girl who was a toddler at the time of her disappearance. Pauline Picard had disappeared when outside of her family's house on 6 April 1922, at the age of 2, in the village of Goas-al-Ludu, Saint Rivoal, Brittany. Pauline's fate is rather disputed. The question whether the deceased body of a child found after Pauline's disappearance is truly Pauline Picard's or not, is disputed. Category:1922 deaths Category:People from Brittany Category:People murdered in Europe Category:Murdered children
title: Disappearance of Pauline Picard
